description: Update an accelerator to make changes, such as the following: Be aware that static IP addresses remain assigned to your accelerator for as long as it exists, even if you disable the accelerator and it no longer accepts or routes traffic. However, when you delete the accelerator, you lose the static IP addresses that are assigned to it, so you can no longer route traffic by using them.

parameters.name: AcceleratorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator to update.

parameters.name: IpAddresses
parameters.description: The IP addresses for an accelerator. (string) ---

parameters.name: Enabled
parameters.description: Indicates whether an accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false. The default value is true. If the value is set to true, the accelerator cannot be deleted. If set to false, the accelerator can be deleted.

nested_items.name: AcceleratorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the accelerator.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the accelerator. The name must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens (-), and must not begin or end with a hyphen.

nested_items.name: IpAddressType
nested_items.description: The IP address type that an accelerator supports. For a standard accelerator, the value can be IPV4 or DUAL_STACK.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the accelerator is enabled. The value is true or false. The default value is true.

nested_items.name: IpSets
nested_items.description: The static IP addresses that Global Accelerator associates with the accelerator.

nested_items.name: IpFamily
nested_items.description: IpFamily is deprecated and has been replaced by IpAddressFamily.

nested_items.name: IpAddresses
nested_items.description: The array of IP addresses in the IP address set. An IP address set can have a maximum of two IP addresses.

nested_items.name: IpAddressFamily
nested_items.description: The types of IP addresses included in this IP set.

nested_items.name: DnsName
nested_items.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to an accelerator's static IPv4 addresses.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Describes the deployment status of the accelerator.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the accelerator was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the accelerator was last modified.

nested_items.name: DualStackDnsName
nested_items.description: The Domain Name System (DNS) name that Global Accelerator creates that points to a dual-stack accelerator's four static IP addresses: two IPv4 addresses and two IPv6 addresses.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: A history of changes that you make to an accelerator in Global Accelerator.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A string that contains an Event message describing changes or errors when you update an accelerator in Global Accelerator from IPv4 to dual-stack, or dual-stack to IPv4.

nested_items.name: Timestamp
nested_items.description: A timestamp for when you update an accelerator in Global Accelerator from IPv4 to dual-stack, or dual-stack to IPv4.
